title: How musicians are using NFTs (Full LineCheck episode)
description:
NFTs (non-fungible tokens) are a fashionable way to support artists, but they’re also confusing and controversial. Diane recruits Marketplace Business News Senior Editor Rick Karr and musicians Ness Nite and Allan Kingdom to define the opportunities and issues of NFTs.

Full LineCheck playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYClJc3TpV5Lgb2cnQjjHfCfuzm9puhr7

title: Ness Nite - Martianhands (Live for LineCheck)
description:
Ness Nite performs their unreleased song "Martianhands" for The Current's LineCheck series. Find the full archive of LineCheck episodes here: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYClJc3TpV5Lgb2cnQjjHfCfuzm9puhr7
